name: Soul Mirror
description:
Soul Mirror is an FPS where you will die. The only question is: how long will you survive?

You play simultaneously in the Normal World and in the Mirror World. When you kill an enemy in one world, it is first sent to the other world. After killing an enemy in both world, it disappears forever (he's soul disintegrates painfully, etc... etc...). You can switch focus between the 2 worlds at any time with SPACE.

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • Mouse to turn around
  • SPACE to switch to the Mirror World and back
